website_summaries.verdict: A model that comes with many of the features of its competitors at a lower price.
pros: Though this model is higher-priced than other Shark robotic vacuums, it includes the convenient self-empty base and features the most powerful suction among Shark models
Easy to control with voice or app
cons: Can take several days to fully map house

customer_reviews.title: Shark IQ
customer_reviews.text: I bought a low end iRobot vacuum for $400 few years ago as a second cleaning vacuum. Shark IQ is an upgrade at the same price but with more advanced features. Shark cleaned my house effectively especially picked up the pet hair in the mud room and amazingly picked up the long hair without tangling the brush roll. It’s loud on the hard wood floor but I really don’t care since I only use it while no one is around. it is very powerful to clean the pets hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: My shark performs outstanding the only time it has a error is when it sucks up something to big or if I leave a sock on the floor (minor things). Overall cleanliness is great. I have dogs and had dog hair clumps everywhere. Now I never see dog hair and my house is always clean. I love my robot vacuum!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine is not loud / Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Mine is not loud. It makes noise but not insane. Schedule it to run at night if needed. 3 suction strengths. I like the high setting. Medium is default and works great too. I have hardwood floors with a rug. So far the only issues I have are self-inflicted. I have a toddler and the robot will find the toys. If a toy gets stuck under it but the robot is still mobile. It will not be able to dock. Contact charging between the base and robot. However, I always know because the robot sends my phone a message. My first robot. I am sold.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I was skeptical of the negative reviews at first. Seems as though many of the reviews are from Roomba fans (or the company) and they have a targeted campaign against shark. It's analogous to iPhone vs Android users. Competition brings out the best, and sometimes paying more doesn't always get you more. Very happy so far with my shark. Yes, it's a little loud but so is a vacuum... We have it scheduled for early mornings when there is ample light. Sensors get a little dirty but that is expected. It's a vacuum cleaner and it cleans! I'm frankly very happy to pay half the price and get the same quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised (for me) also some answers to whats not been asked
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem as loud as some people have "commented" lead me to believe mine is not working right, but the floors are clean so.. I guess it is. Also, I have some crazy vaulted ceilings, and was afraid the mapping would not work. (Not complete yet) but it does seem to be figuring it out. It does get stuck but that’s my fault where it get stuck i think nearly any bot would. The app works fine too. Bottom line, my floors are clean I don’t have to empty the thing out every day, when it gets clogged it from some weird thing my kids left on the floor. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bernicker

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: It gets stuck every single time. It says cliff sensors are blocked. They're not. It will never finish mapping your house because it can never finish a whole cycle. And good luck getting anyone who speaks English on the phone for customer support.
customer_reviews.author: UCF10fan

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum Bot
customer_reviews.text: Good vacuum bot. Way cheaper than the equivalent roomba. It works great. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Dose not clean and is very loud
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this shark system. Machine is very loud and does not clean very good. It only runs for an hour before recharging for 4 hours to continue. App loses connection without reason. Returned item and will not buy another. Bad choice
customer_reviews.author: Charles K. Walls

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum. But loud.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this vacuum. Had it about 2 months nos. This is my first robot vacuum. Read a lot of reviews of how loud it is and thought maybe it’s just louder than they prefer, BUT it is pretty loud while operating. Definitely can’t run it while you’re asleep or kids are asleep. I always run it when we’re at work or not at home anyways so that wasn’t a deal breaker for me. The suction and power seems great. Always picks up stuff that I never knew was on our floors. Happy with purchase overall. Wished it weren’t so noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan_L

customer_reviews.title: It’s loud but it’s worth it 😐
customer_reviews.text: This thing is noisy but I purchased the Roomba i7 both brand new and it is a better vacuum for sure ☝️ I kept both for 2 days before I sent the Roomba i7back 😐 the self unloading trash is worth putting up with the noise for me 😎
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: It still vaccums with full bin :(
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I got this one was the fact I didnt have to empty the bin every 10mins ( 3 dogs in the house lots of hair) unfortunately, I still had to tell the vaccum every 10mins to unload debris into docking station. If not it would keep going and not get anything bc it was full. Just super upset!!!! I needed this too work. :(
customer_reviews.author: kavin

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum robot I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This robot does what its post to do I feel like this robot knows were to go..their was a couple times it got stuck under my bed an under my kitchen table..when I tested it I couldn't believe how much it picked up..it comes with tape comes in handy to block of rooms u want keep out..the battery last 1hour an half. The mapping of my house dont look like my house the app is pain in the butt they need fix the bugs out of it..this is a great vacuum dont care what the bad reviews the people left..my house is so clean I can sit back let the robot do its job
customer_reviews.author: jeffery d.

customer_reviews.title: day time operation only and no manual control
customer_reviews.text: It appears to operate as described there are three (3) things I do not like about it 1. it needs light to operate according too the manual... I have not tried it in a low light lever or dark setting. It does not have any type of control, you must use the phone app to control.. it appears only to work on a schedule, there is no manual way to control
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it a zero stars I would
customer_reviews.text: Loud, doesn't pick up well, never mapped the house fully or even one room for that matter. It would ram into its own base, and I would find it stuck or in the middle of the floor on a daily basis. Returned it and paid up for th iRobot i7 and have had nothing but positives with it, it's gotten stuck once, but mostly it mapped completely and actually works with Alexa where the shark didn't. You get what you pay for and I have two English bulldogs who shed constantly so I need a quality robot vac or I would be sweeping endlessly. I like other shark product, just not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Hill

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded our Shark to this intelligent model. Tested just now and it did a better job then my old model Rotator. Went back to base after finishing everything. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I wanted a robot vacuum cleaner with more of a pattern, that would not miss places...this was supposed to map the house! It still runs around crazy and missed places...guess I should have bought the I robot / roomba... guess you get what you pay for...disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware, poor software
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying I have no complaints about this vacuums ability to clean. It actually does a great job in my home. Additionally, the self empty bin is great! My big issue is with the software. The app for the vacuum is downright awful and getting worse. A recent "update" removed the ability to see the vacuums battery status. The biggest issue is mapping. I have been stuck at 33% for weeks. Without a complete map I'm unable to use all the features this vacuum has, most notably the ability the clean specific rooms. Hopefully these issues can be resolved with a future update.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this product yet. First time the cup did not empty completely so it didnt run the second time it was programmed. We have a lot of dog hair and when emptying it seemed to suck out the middle of the cup but not the sides. The self emptying part was a big part of the reason we bought it. We will give it another week or so but if it doesn’t rectify itself we will definitely return it. It is also much noisier than the iRoomba I had previously. Very disappointed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the auto-empty dock!!
customer_reviews.text: 1 year later, can say with confidence this was a fantastic purchase. No issues, runs fine all on its own. I do think they need to improve the app - I wish I could set it to always run with "high suction" or have a button the vacuum itself, instead each time have to manually change to "high" after it has started. It should just remember what you set it to the last time!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Now

customer_reviews.title: very good for pet hair and  bagless self-empty base
customer_reviews.text: We like that shark IQ Robot dose a great job cleaning two room and pet in our house. suction seems ample and it picks up dirt well. keeping hair off the rollers and very quiet on carpet The self emptying feature is very smart. only time it has a error is when it sucks up something to big or minor things on the floor. I have dogs hair clumps everywhere. Now see dog hair is gone and my house is clean.Robot does great job . I am happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Bai

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: At first I was pleased with the product. I've now had it a couple of months, and I can't get through a day without it getting stuck or having some sort of sensor issue. It's really frustrating. When it works, it's great, but it's not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the Baby Shark does not map my rooms as it stated it would and it does not automatically dock itself in order to recharge before the battery ran out. I returned on numerous occasions with it sitting in a room with the battery dead at which point I had to carry it to the docking station to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not as advertized
customer_reviews.text: 1. Lot of noise. 2. Suction very weak, it does not even pick up debris of a cat food. 3. It does not clean as expected or advertised. Leaving wide straight lines of uncleaned areas on the floor. I would not recommend to anyone. Using it only for second day I am already thinking of returning this BS for regular vacuum cleaner. Will give it one more day and if nothing changes will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not for houses with long haired pets.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Golden Retriever and he sheds SO much. I was vacuuming twice a day so decided to try the Shark Robot because I LOVE my Shark Rotator. For houses with mild dust, I can see it working okay. But it didn’t pick up fur even on highest setting. This is my first experience with a robot vacuum so I didn’t know what to expect, but for us it’s not worth the price. I enjoy convenience, but this did not give me that as I was having to vacuum after it ran every single time. I still swear by my Shark Rotator vacuum, though!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Not worth any amount of money.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Wifi can only pair at 2g. 2. Would not recognize connection on several attempts until app was deleted and reinstalled. 3. Vacuum makes grinding noise. 4. Vacuum would not respond to "return to base" command and would not dock unless placed by hand directly over it. 5. Vacuum came with specks of dirt and dust, with power cord dropped in the box which is obvious give away for returned/repackaged/resold. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Happy New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: extremely week mapping functionality.
customer_reviews.text: In several room environments, it has never build a useful map and it is never were able to finish cleaning. It always was not able to find way back to the base.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim Mikheev

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but doesn't pick up pet hair from a rug
customer_reviews.text: I love the auto-empty since I am lazy. Solid 4/5 keeping our hardwood floors tidy with daily scheduled cleaning. However, the suction and cleaning of dog hair on our rug is abysmal. It picks up maybe 20% of the hair, at best. Our 4 year old Roomba does a better job pulling pet hair from rugs. The Shark coverage/mapping also feels subpar - it sometimes skips portions of our odd floor layout. Overall I don't regret the purchase, but I wouldn't buy it again -- I'd save up for the self-emptying iRobot instead.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lisk

customer_reviews.title: This is a horrible. My cheap old roomba is way better.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the worst. It can't seem to run for more then 5 min without being stuck on something small. It disconnects from wifi. The collection chamber doesn't empty. I ended up using my old Roomba and it handled it with no problem. This thing is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Has a hard time finding ya home base, doesn’t really suck up much, battery too small to do more than two rooms with max suction on in order to actually get anything. Decent programming but shark needs to fix the above issues before it becomes a decent replacement for a normal vac. I can do a room 8x faster and spend less for a good vacuum as apprised time buying this. What can I say, we tried it, didn’t work, maybe it will for you but I passed. Not worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lando

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best purchases I have made!! We are a busy family with two teens and three dogs. Two of our dogs shed and this requires a daily vacuum run to keep the floors clean. I love coming home a seeing vacuum lines in the carpet and having the tile free of debris. It did take around 14 runs to map the house and I primarily use the scheduling feature in the app to control the cleaning times. I just named the rooms on my map and enabled the voice activation with Alexa. I am looking forward to having my shark vacuum the kitchen only after dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Love it ... takes a couple days to learn though
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Step up your robot
customer_reviews.text: Iv’e had multiple other robots over the years. This by far is the best yet! It maps your home accurately and gives you the ability to view it on your phone. The robots battery lasts at least double the time of my other robots. The best part Is the bag less self empty! No more messing with the grime filled bin, or cutting hair off the roller. I have a large dog and it easily takes care of his constantly shedding coat without scratching the floors and has yet to get stuck on a vent or rug.
customer_reviews.author: clark2298

customer_reviews.title: I love my Shark robot
customer_reviews.text: I have one upstairs and one downstairs and they do an amazing job. I have not vacuumed or swept my floors in 6 months and they are always clean. Easy setup, works well with Alexa, and I like the self-schedule feature. My only complaint is that on the carpet, I have a lot of problems with the machine not continuing after detecting my stairs. It is supposed to detect, not fall and continue on. It detects, then gets confused and stops about 25% of the time. Overall I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: It sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I bet this title hasn't been used already. The suction power of this vacuum is nice for the price. The deep cleaning on the other hand... when it comes to hardwood floors with small crevices, excellent; however, with area rugs, not so much. There is still some launching of objects with the rotating brushes, insomuch that some small dirt/debris is propelled away from the vacuum instead of under to be sucked up, but otherwise it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It works great but I wish there was a better app for it
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great, it even empties itself out during cleaning. Although you can clean out the filter canister monthly, I do it daily to preserve the unit and its suction. The software lets you schedule and even maps room but it be nice if I could run more that one schedule a day if the mapping allowed you to edit it without having to rename all the rooms all over again, just to adjust one. Still I would highly recommend getting one. I can't believe how much cleaner my home is with it. It navigates well, doesn't trip over stairs. It's cute the way it turns itself around and shimmies itself onto the base to empty it's dust bin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've named mine Mr. Wonderful! Because, A) It really is wonderful B) It's a Shark I really don't know what else I could ask for. It's cleaning is good, it's mapping is good, it's app is good, and it's self emptying is GREAT. I have noticed that some rooms benefit quite a bit by cranking it's vacuum suction all the way up. That helps with small objects and hair. It wears down the battery more, but it has a good result and the vacuum picks up near where it left off after recharge. I got Mr. Wonderful on Prime Day at a huge discount. So it's price and shipping were great as well! No regrets with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: A relief to daily heavylift works.
customer_reviews.text: With 8 people living in a house over 1800 sqft and 4 rooms, everyday cleaning can be a real "thing ", this one is really a game changer, Just click “clean”, it did the cleaning job for me. It’s also easy to find “home” when the battery is low. Very happy to have a clean home after work every day. The guys are doing great job by providing time to time OTA upgrade. I am very glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin J

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to purchase this vacuum because we had had one of the first robot vacuums years ago and experienced some trouble with it. However, I LOVE this Shark vacuum, it cleans very well. It is so nice to not have to empty the tray like other models. We named the vacuum, Baby Shark. We would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Daniel

customer_reviews.title: overall good, just be aware of a few things
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Easily finds it's way back to the dock so long as it has a straight path bath to it - Can get phone alerts when it's stuck because of a problem - It's smart enough to know where it is, because it knows where it isn't (creates map of home) - No-go zones Cons - Base doesn't always fully empty out the bot - If you have a large dog that sheds a lot, it will get most of the fur but not all of it, multiple passes may be required. - App doesn't allow you to schedule more than 1 cleaning a day.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Most definite buy for you money!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I can relax, watch TV and have my floors vacuumed at the same time! 3 shedding dogs, works magic!
customer_reviews.author: avid.reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum that actually cleans!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing i have bought so far on Amazon. I did a lot of research before buying a robot vacuum and found this Shark AE product most suitable for my needs. After using this vacuum for about 3 months now...it has exceeded my expectations. It has good suction power, empties itself between runs and resumes cleaning after getting discharged. The only drawback is it takes time to generate full map of your home. Otherwise if you need an easy to use robot vacuum which actually cleans your house then go for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aftab K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I did some research before buying this and I found that this had the best value for a high-quality vacuum. I have had it for more than 2 months and it works great at cleaning and moving around the house. It has many features such as the emptying station, and recharge when needed before returning to work. The app makes it easy to use the vacuum from anywhere and see the progress. The only downside that I see is that it takes a long time (about a month) to map the house in order to clean specific rooms. Besides this, it is a great product, but watch out because they are climbers!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Lots of obstacles and pets, no problem for this vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Merry Christmas to me! After failing to convince certain my wife to buy one for over 2 years, I took matters in my own hands and purchased my Shark as a Christmas gift to our house. So let me say, our house 2000square feet, cut up in multiple rooms. Lots of furniture. 3 dogs, 2 cats. Plus we take care of our mom with her misc medical equipment. Yes it failed a couple times in the beginning. Mostly little cat toys hidden under the bed, or the couch, but after a while the little bot starting perfecting his cleaning pattern. It's perfect now, pet hair is no problem. I love it, totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: AB Squared

customer_reviews.title: I love this robo vac and the self emptying feature.  Buy It. You know you want to. 😏
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love Love It! I love this robo vac and the self emptying feature. I have a dog and two cats. I run the vacuum every morning while the family is sleeping. It took about a week and a half for the vacuum to map my home. I empty the bin about every three days. It goes easily from my pergo floors, to my the kitchen tiled kitchen floor, to my living room area rug and to the long shag area rug in my daughters room. My only regret is not buying it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Shickama

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job without Expensive bags
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) Cleans the rooms. 2) Works from app and from Google Assistant "Hey Google, Tell Shark to clean" Cons 1) Unexplained scheduled cleaning not happening sometimes. I don't know if it's kids or something else but cleaning then starts immediately if I trigger it from phone or google assistant. 2) While it does clean everywhere it's supposed to, I don't understand the maps. I visually can't see it and maybe the mapping isn't exact....not sure. Going to try mapping again. Overall 5 stars because it does what it's supposed to do for cleaning. Everything is cleaned after the run. It covers all rooms. It empties itself without needing replacement bags. It costs half as much as iRobot.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Suction is not impressive
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t suck well. Not sure if it’s just mine or if it’s with this model across the board. It doesn’t sound loud enough to make it seem like it’s an actual vacuum with suction. Just seems like it’s sweeping and bruising more than sucking. I had family over for the holidays with a several year old roomba (mid range, not top of the line) and they were commenting on how it isn’t picking up nearly what theirs does And doesn’t sound like the suction is on. This was on an empty bin. I didn’t save the box so I cannot return. I would be happy to receive another to test and update this review.
customer_reviews.author: DT Beck

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: DISLIKES: 1. unit doesn't work properly to map areas to be cleaned. 2. Customer support less than satisfactory. Spent 30 minutes only to be told they will call me back in 2 days. 3. customer service rep had heavy accent and hard to understand. 4. tried to set up on android phone, GalaxyS10+ without success after 2 hours 5. NEVER received email to complete set up after sending from Galaxy S10+ over 15 times from the phone and once from the tech service rep at 800-365-0135 5. the unit does NOT map 4 rooms and a hallway at all. It does one room and then returns to base never to start again on its own to finish vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Better than iRobot
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it better than Roomba. Gets all the grime off tile floors. Hair doesn’t get caught in it. Recharges it,s self and cleans longer then roomba
customer_reviews.author: Jeff phillips

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this vacuum almost a month ago. Loved it, then it started leaving clumps of hair on my floors, mostly the carpeted ones. Thought I would post a negative review but then I read the manual and cleaned my vacuum. It works perfectly. Cleaning it out took me 5 minutes. The suction power is great!! Stopped using powdered carpet deodorizer over a year ago because they are vacuum killers. Every time I empty the bin there is more powder in it. Hope it doesn't kill this vacuum. Programed it to vacuum every day. Be sure to empty the bin after a few uses and clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: My dog hates it, but I don’t care
customer_reviews.text: We have a Pyrenees and have struggled with his shedding for the whole time. Our old Roomba would either fill up too quickly or get tangled up in hit fur, but the Shark is killing it. We run it three times a week and it keeps our hardwood floors looking way better. It has a little trouble getting fur off the rug at our back door, but that has deeper pile so I’m not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: I went on the internet, and I bought this...

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase because of some of the negative reviews, however this is far superior to my previous Roomba 650. I got this on a Black Friday deal for $330 and it has been superb. It mapped my house in about 5 runs. It seems to get stuck far less often than my old Roomba. It seems to clean better as well. Does a great job on my hardwood floors and rugs and the auto empty works pretty flawlessly. I’d say it is is a tad loud but no worse than the Roomba 650. I think this is a great value considering the price of the auto empty Roomba’s. No regrets here!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose Shark over iRobot for my first one!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time with a robot vacuum. I reached out to fitness for reviews, researched online and watched YouTube videos! I was worried because of so many complaints! I like the App. Very easy to use. Was super simple to set up! Only got stuck on my sliding glass door track but hubby said it came with a “no go” zone marker? I’ll have to read up on that! This is much quieter than a traditional vacuum but when it docs to empty it does have a high power auction sound for 15 or so seconds. Overall our first use I find myself saying... why did I wait this long?
customer_reviews.author: Christopher & Theresa

customer_reviews.title: This is Shark Stupid IQ or Shark Super Low IQ
customer_reviews.text: Let me tel you this: This is Shark Stupid IQ or Shark Super Low IQ. Keep hitting, and even hit its own base. I had Xiaomi Cheap version and Robotrock S5, much better. And this Shark eats everything on its way, so stupid. 95% it stuck somewhere at the house. I will return this. My robotrock S5 work so fast, maps very fast. I will wait until Roborock or other laser mapping vacuum have an empty bin and buy it as an upgrade. This one? NOPE. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Ken L

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it! I have a large dog that sheds very badly. Vacuuming is difficult for me physically. Now my floors are clean and when I walk through the house hair doesn’t follow me!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hill

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a Neato vacuum, it did an adequate job for years, with a new house and dead batteries, it was time to upgrade. I am very happy with this purchase. It is quiet (considering it is a vacuum cleaner). It is still learning my house, but improving, it does get lost and keeps returning to the area under the TV, but aside from that, it cleans up beautifully after three dogs. It connected easily with Alexa, and I laugh at it every time she asks for the robot’s name. Emptying the tank took me about 20 seconds to learn. In short, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JudyWren

customer_reviews.title: Constant error message
customer_reviews.text: Every time I send it out, I get a obstruction message. It worked great for about a week. Then started having problems. I have done everything I can to try to get it to work. I spent way to much time on it. Its suppose to save me time. Big waste of money. I have a Deebot for a year now that works great. She just needs a assistant. I thought the shark would do the job. I was so wrong. At first I was very impressed, because the shark went over the carpet well. Now I can't get the shark to work work more than 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: dona

customer_reviews.title: The one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is for hard surface floors, not carpet. It is fantastic and many others, there are replacement batteries available for a good price. Others won't even sell you a battery. I love the mapping. It travels back and forth in straight lines and cleans very efficiently and quickly. It is also very quiet. If you have pets you will occasionally have to turn it over and remove the snap on cover and roller but the brush stays hair free. You can set scheduals or since It has wifi so you can start it before Mom comes for the weekend. This is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Vic Peters

customer_reviews.title: Not the best choice for large pet(s) homes
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to love this. And the self empty was the feature I was most looking forward to. My vac did complete the mapping and it found its way back to the base every time. My biggest problem is having 3 German shepherds and 4 cats. That’s a lot for a regular vac to handle. And too much for a robot vac. After the first couple of runs it just jammed up and went back to its base and stayed there. I’m still giving it 2 stars because it did vacuum, and gave it a good try. But I needed up sending it back after about 8 attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Commandeur-Collins

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient
customer_reviews.text: We love to have our shark running and emptying itself through out the day. We have 2 children, 2 shedding dogs, and a shedding cat. We need all the help we can get in the vacuuming Dept. The shark is great for in between but should not be substituted for regular vacuuming. It is good for maintenance and in between deep cleaning. The robot also takes a while to learn your home. It took about one weeks for the robot to figure out where it was going. The shark is SUPER quiet. It is fantastic to run during the day, or while you may be home. However, the shark needs light to figure out where it’s going.
customer_reviews.author: Jayi8

customer_reviews.title: Husbands entertainment !
customer_reviews.text: Since receiving mine as a Christmas gift, I don't think I have had to dig out my big upright only to appease my sense of deep cleaning. Husband follows it around and makes sure it doing a good job, to which is says it does. Programmed to do its thing 3 times a week and I have found not cat hair flying around like before. Cleanest my floors have been ever. Love the docking system for auto emptying and then it goes back out and finishes the job or charge its battery. This is what I call no brainer cleaning. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sura

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old roomba, wanted a smart vacuum so I purchased the Roomba 985 at Costco. It was loud but did a great job. I just hated having to pick out all dust with my fingers every night! This vacuum, although not as thorough, cleans itself! It is also really quiet in comparison! The map so far shows inconsistencies with area cleaned and doesn't seem to have as good an app but it is way sufficient and super easy to clean without the need for special bags like the Roomba i7 or i9, and WAY less expensive! I'm satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: lzbn69

customer_reviews.title: Not for larger homes.
customer_reviews.text: Steer clear of you have a larger home (2000 sqft+ vacuum area) and pets. - It doesn't know when it's dirt bin is full, which is EXTREMELY small, this causes it to clog and unable to self empty. The lack of a sensor let's you and it believe it is working properly well past the time the clog happens. - There is a feature on the app that tells the bin to empty earlier but is not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with this new vacuum, better than my old version irobot! This vacuum robot does a great job in my home and picks up so much dust under the beds and sofas! It sits quietly on the charging station, and noise level isn't as loud as my old roomba when cleaning. I really like the function of collecting all the dust into a bin, so I just need to empty the bin once a week that is a big plus! For a fraction of the newer roomba, I highly recommeded it!
customer_reviews.author: Simondadad

customer_reviews.title: Why buy an IRoomba when you can get a Shark?
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a big fan of Shark vacuums and this one is right up there with the current and past vacuums. I have been eyeing the iRoomba that also has a docking station that empties the dust catcher for some time but refuse to spend upwards of $1300 for one. Then Shark came out with a similar product and I couldn't be more happy. One issues that I have is with the GUI interface trying to get the areas sectioned off, but I haven't put that much time of effort into it. Overall another Shark that I am happy with.
customer_reviews.author: PelBro

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Shark IQ Robot for a while now, it works great. Although it's a little bit loud but suction is powerful comparing to my old robot. I really like the self empty base. It keeps the robot running without stopping every time to empty the dust bin. That saves a lot of effort. I have a cat at home and I sprinkled some cat food on the floor to test, the robot clean it well without anything left. Overall I'm very satisfied with the Shark IQ Robot, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L.

customer_reviews.title: We love this little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this about a month now and just love it. We have two dogs (BorderCollie and Mini-Aussie) a cat and two birds. The Macaw is always shedding his "fluff". It took about a week to get the house mapped and it runs every other day around 2000 sq. ft. It cleans up the dog hair and bird fluff. Then goes and dumps itself and goes on it's way! It DID take it some time to "learn" our house layout! We spend several days pulling it out of tight spots, etc.. But once it "learned" it does a wonderful job!
customer_reviews.author: TerreMT

customer_reviews.title: No US contact available
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for Christmas was a pain to set up and you have to use your cell phone. Quit working and I tried to get customer service which redirects your call to a call center in Bogata, Columbia. I dont know about you but i do Not like to give the information they required to a foreign country. No US contact is available. I finally go someone to help me without providing personal information. If i had known this i would not have purchased
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: shark unsecured network won't connect
customer_reviews.text: i can not sync the unit with my iphone due to Sharks unsecured network so can't comment on other aspects since I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: whitherwe

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: this thing is pretty awesome. It does it thing goes back empties itself and goes out if there is enough charge left! On minor problem. If you own a german shepherd, it will fill up with soooooooooooomuch hair. But the brush stays clean! I find that the wife and I have to help it out by just stopping it, clean out the hair and start it back up. The roomba we had before this could not even handle our black labs hair. The self emptying is wonderful. The hair it does get will fill that thing up quick. But it is a very nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: James Golden

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like this product.
customer_reviews.text: Gave some time for my review. I really wanted to like this shark robot vacuum. It was pretty quiet and had great suction but it always had issues finding the dock and when it did sometimes she would miss since the vacuum has to turn around and back up onto the charger. The app that connects to the vacuum has som problems. It takes a long time for the vacuum to create a map and everytime it did it wouldn't match the rooms cleaned at all. App also crashed alot.
customer_reviews.author: Paulster91197

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Awful - doesn’t stay on WiFi - cheaper model actually works better - do not buy - started having issues after return date to amazon expired - now I either have go through tier two of trying to fix it - which means hrs on the phone with Shark help or eat this cost. I have rebooted it to factory settings twice - gets on network then doesn’t - have no other issues with WiFi - machine tells me that I am entering wrong WiFi password - again don’t buy iRobot’s worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Vance

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: We had three robots already and this is far and away the best. It cleaned the entire house much more quickly and thoroughly. I have a big house and this robot can always find its way back. This is amazing. The only downside is that the recharge and resume feature is confusing. My robot automatically starts when I don’t expect it to clean. I called the customer center and they explained to me. Now I am used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Yin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I have spent more time since getting this thing, just trying to get it to find rooms in the house. The app is a joke, mapping is completely non-existent, and most of the time, I have to manually place it on its base due to its getting lost. It’s going back to Amazon, PRONTO!
customer_reviews.author: Francine Meister

customer_reviews.title: Not for larger homes
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with my first robot at first, however, it was difficult to set up. My whole network failed while setting this up and not sure if it was the cause. The battery just does not have enough life to make this thing effective. I have a larger ranch style house and in 3 days it still has not vacuumed the whole house. I might have to get 2 or three of these things to get my house cleaned in a day. It picks up pet hair just fine, and hair pins (I live with 3 women).
customer_reviews.author: Julie Neipp

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Honestly. BEST investment ever. I got ours on black friday. We are busy people and have a lab who is mostly outside however sleeps inside. It's a LOT of hair!!! This shark is awesome. We let it do its thing and it cleans so well. Honestly very impressive. There are 3 suction modes and we normally do the max level. We schedule ours for every day at 10am. The bin is the best and it auctions the trash into it fairly well. If you are thinking about it,really consider one of these!!!
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: The worst product ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is the most worthless and the most aggravating product that i have ever bought plus it cost a lot of money. It is far more trouble to use than just using a standard vacuum. It will sit and spin around 20 times trying to get under a piece of furniture that it wont fit under when it has a wide open area next to it that it doesn't ever get to. Shark should be ashamed to sell a piece of crap product like this. i keep thinking it will get better but NO!!!!!!!. I rated it a 1 only because a 0 rating was not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: I was really impressed by this one
customer_reviews.text: I have had a shark in the past, lasted about 6 years, so decided when it died to get the newer upgraded version with the trash bin, I totally love this one, it actually goes up and down the floor and really picks up better than my old one did, and the bin is awesome too easy to clean this as well. I highly recommend this one, thank you for surpassing my expectations on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great value, powerful suction,  good navigation after mapping completed.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this vacuum for 2 months now. It is on a schedule and pretty much hands off at this point. Amazing if you have pets. Initially we had a few hiccups with the app but now it all works. Ours mapped our house pretty quickly and operates pretty efficiently. It is noisy but keep in mind this thing has a lot of suction at its highest settings. It has made a big difference in our home. There seems to be some people who have an issue with this thing and we don’t understand where that comes from we have nothing but good stuff to say.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Christmas gift for parents
customer_reviews.text: I got one shark for myself and it’s life changing product for me. So I decided to buy one for my parents as well as a gift. They have over 3500 sq ft of hardwood floor with a few rugs in various locations. The only issue was the unit would get stuck around our Christmas tree. I put the magnetic strip around it and now it can completely avoids those areas. The app is pretty easy for them to learn and use. They love the ability to schedule the clean anytime during the week and they can remotely start cleaning when they are not at home. Great product!!! Thanks shark!
customer_reviews.author: MartinZ

customer_reviews.title: this thing is a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: this robot s junk . i chatted with amazon and they wont return it. they want me to send time with shark on the phone. as far as i am concerned we got ripped off. this thing has tried mapping our simple 1700 square foot home probably 30 times and it still gets lost and wont do all my rooms. it gets stuck by driving up the foot on the recliner. i wish i could just return it. thinking this thing might be fun target practice at the gun range very soon. never buy again and i would stay away and save your money for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I've had the vacuum now for about 3 weeks and it is just not living up to the $500 dollar price tag. I first 2 times we set it off it worked great picking up more than expected. I watched the shark video about how to clean the machine and the self emptying base. Now that we have had it for 3 weeks the performance has gone down tremendously. Leaving most things on the floor and getting lost when it needs to go back to the base to charge or empty. My wife and i have a new born so i had high hopes to help her out as I'm at work a lot but it isn't doing the job
customer_reviews.author: Luisa M.

customer_reviews.title: It is great works with Alexa and cleans itself I just have to do it do you about every 10 days
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I have all hardwood floors and two Australian Shepherd’s. It works great and keeps the dog hair in the vacuum but not on floor. All I have to do is say Alexa tell shark baby doll to clean. And it takes off. Only problem is I have two floors so I mainly just use it upstairs
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: If you can review this product do so I am very disappointed was not a cheap purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It got stuck over and over again I couldn’t find The dock, difficult time hooking up with Wi-Fi after being stuck schedule on Wi-Fi disappeared, try to re-hook up with it via iPhone no success so far have to call the company to solve the problem. My Roomba was much easier to operate straightforward reschedule online and it performed, I would not recommend this product to anyone it is not performing what it supposed to I have a good mind to put it back in the box and send it back to the manufacture it’s about a month old and it is not performing.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Minihane

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Every night I set this off and it cleans the entire house and returns to it's base. I had done a lot of prep work to make sure there were no cords or anything else on the floor that might impede it's progress and I've been completely satisfied. My floors are cleaner than they've ever been. About once a week I follow up with my Bissell Crosswave to mop the floor and it gets much less dirt up than it has in the past. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not enough vacuum power
customer_reviews.text: I am a shark fan and have had several uprights. The shark IQ robot vac is definitely smart, and the mapping works great. However, the most important function of a Vacuum is to Vac. It is clear why the PA Suction power of this machine is not written anywhere. After vacuuming 2 weeks, I had less than 2 cubic inches of debris in the self emptying cannister. And that is continuously cleaning the robot internal screen and filter. Going to try one with at least 1300 PA of vacuuming power.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: My first robo vac...not sure how others compare but this one continuously gets stuck in spot you wouldn't think it would get stuck (i.e. under sofa's, on floor lamp bases. I finally got it to finish my house map and it didn't appear to be anything like my floorplan. Sometimes it would get stuck and the message would tell me to clear items from around the base. I wiped off the sensor and got the same message the next day. Come to find out there were objects stuck in the wheel. This vac is very high maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: remoteless
customer_reviews.text: this product is useless without a remote. another company trying to capitalize on smart phones assuming everyone has one, what a mistake. in a home were wireless access is unavailable you have to manually set off the vacuum daily if you want it to run. I just want to return this for a quieter item with a remote.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: That it works and cleans and is easy to clean the filters
customer_reviews.text: I have my Sharky cleaning everyday. It is very helpful that it goes under objects that were hard for me to clean. It had a few hiccups when it got stuck on my bathroom rugs but I fixed the issue. I'm still trying to figure out the mapping to make sense of my rooms. Someday I will figure it out. Would like to know if I have to have specific BotBoundary strips when ordering more for my SharkIQRobot. Great product. Happy Holidays. Love and Gratitude.
customer_reviews.author: Jango

customer_reviews.title: Long haired cat
customer_reviews.text: I am a single man. My daughter gave me a long haired cat so I wouldn't be alone. She didn't realize the cat shed in Biblical proportion. The Shark is amazing. I should mention I have grandchildren and they leave things about that may interfere with the Sharks operation. However, it is quick to holler for help. My only regret having bought the Shark is I didn't do it sooner. My son and daughter in law have a more expensive Roomba they loved but having done the setup on my Shark for me , I think they are jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L Wilson

customer_reviews.title: House keeper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product; especially, for hardwood floors. It goes places I didn't think it would go and climbs over small obstacles. It gets close to baseboards, corners and under beds and dressers. I wouldn't say it does a "deep" clean on carpet but it gets the visible items very well. It does have a problem with deep pile and I would suggest flipping it over every couple times to clean around the brush roller.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Miller

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this product, however, every time i use it, I get an error. I have to continuously babysit it, turn it over and clear the error. In the time it takes to clear the 4-8 error messages when it powers up and gets started, I could’ve already vacuumed my floors already! It’s set up was a bit challenging as well. It’s not as convenient as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Brettelle

customer_reviews.title: Astounded
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing vacuum robot, does everything exactly as it states, but I do wish it was a little quiter as we run it at night time, but thats fine because it has picked up everything from between what has been wedge between our hardwood floors, that our standard vacuum has not picked up so amazed by the power this little vacuum puts out, I was kinda concerned about the lip from our hardwood floors to the tile floors as we are finishing the house we bought and don't have transitions pieces yet but it can get over an 1/2 inch lip if anyone is wondering may take a second or two but it will definitely get over.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Does a darn good job for such a little guy!
customer_reviews.text: I have four cats who constantly drag in debris from their outdoor explorations. I used to have to go around the house with a broom and dust pan to avoid dragging out the vacuum. Now I just schedule a cleaning four days a week. I still vacuum with my more powerful Dyson Animal once a week, but frankly this little robot is wonderful. It is really cool the way it maps your house and scheduling it was really easy. My daughter is going to order one too!
customer_reviews.author: Game Cougar

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for five months now. It replaced a budget one that was our first step into robot vac's. Setting it up was easy and it does a pretty good job on cleaning everywhere in the house from the hard floors to the carpets. We like the fact that it empties and then continues on the job. The one downside is the app. They really need to improve the app. If it had a no-go zone area in the app this thing would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: All around competitor killer
customer_reviews.text: What I love most about this Vac is that it has all of the exclusive features that the top rated and or most expensive Robo vacs have but for a fraction of the cost. The app works good the mapping system works good the self emptying system works really good and the vacuum itselfI is well-made. I would say the only real con comes when using it with Alexa. It dose work but There should be a More seamless functionality with Alexa devices in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Man

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be suckered
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I really wanted this to work out. I have had my roomba iRobot 595 for 6-7 years with NO PROBLEMS but wanted an alternative that would self empty. All I’ve had is problem after problem. I wish I would have been able to return it but it was purchased as a Xmas gift so I didn’t open it until too late. It sometimes works 1 out of 10 times. And I’ve called tech support too many times!! It’s not just a paper weight. My 595 is still going strong. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Lover

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The WiFi on this product is very user friendly. Unit works beautifully and exceptionally well. I do have to empty my hopper weekly, as it picks up so much dog hair. It is worth every penny, not to have to sweep daily. And it makes my mopping easier too, because I don’t have to sweep or vacuum first !
customer_reviews.author: Febe S English

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I thought, no way will this clean my dirty floor, I will have to run the dyson first and start with a clean floor. Well, I thought what the heck, let’s just see what it will do. Turned it on, watched a movie and was blown away at how well it cleaned. Even glitter from the books and crannies. I don’t have WiFi ( yes I know, but I prefer to be unplugged at home). And this still works great! Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol J Brown

customer_reviews.title: loses connection, gets lost, can't find home
customer_reviews.text: This product failed to live up to advertising. App is spotty at best. Shark support is terrible. It wouldn't keep a wifi connection for 2 cleaning cycles. During cleaning it would get lost a continually bump into the same object over & over. When battery would drain it could not find home. It would try to go through walls to get there and eventually deplete. Reviews say best vac for the money, maybe so but if cheap don't work then what good is cheap. I have gone to ROOMBA and it has worked perfect out of the box... Not Cheap though.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Dog Momma’s Dream
customer_reviews.text: Been using is for a week. Does a great job of cleaning even on low suction. It’s more thorough than our previous random pattern vac. And it’s quiet. Couldn’t stay in the house with the other one. Slept through this one this morning. If the wall canister will hold 30 days worth of dirt, your house is either tiny or very clean. We need to empty it in about a week. It’s gotten lost/stuck a couple of times but all in all, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Beloved

product_meta.title: Shark IQ Robot Vacuum with Self-Empty Base and Wi-Fi Home Mapping, with XL Capacity Dust Bin, in Black
product_meta.description: Color:In BlackThe Shark IQ Robot Vacuum combines convenience with intelligence and performance. After each cleaning session, your robot vacuum automatically empties the dust bin into the bag less base, which holds dirt and debris from up to 30 cleaning sessions. With IQ NAV, your robot now maps your whole home, allowing you to select which rooms to clean with Shark Clean App or Alexa. The Shark IQ Robot cleans row by row to assure total floor cleaning. On low battery, your robot recharges and resumes where it left off. And with Shark powerful suction and a self-cleaning brush roll, you get amazing cleaning performance.
feature_bullets: Forget about vacuuming for up to a month with the bagless, self-emptying base. Holds up to 30 days of dirt and debris.
Unbeatable suction vs. any Shark robot vacuum for pickup of large and small debris, as well as pet hair on carpets and hard-floors.
Self-cleaning brushroll removes pet hair and long hair from the brushroll as it cleans--no more hair wrap.
Schedule whole-home cleanings or target specific rooms or areas to clean right now with the Shark Clean app or voice control with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant.
Total home mapping with room select maps your home and lets you choose which rooms to clean right now.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars3,847 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
